name: workflow
description: Compound engineering framework for multi-agent AI development. 3-layer knowledge architecture (Knowledge Base + Interactive Map + Session Optimizer), L1-L4 complexity routing, Spec-Driven Development. 7 core + 3 support commands, model-agnostic providers, quality-gated TDD workflow, AI validation learning, and multi-agent coordination. 8 specialized agents, 10 workflow commands, 16 skills, 3 roles. 100% stack-agnostic.
